text: @GovernorKayIvey How about a press conference at least every couple of days? How about you clue us in on your plan? If I get terribly I’ll with #COVID19 I don’t want to be in the ER instead of a regular ICU! We are dangerously close to running out of beds. This is not acceptable. #alpolitics
